meanings.definition: The state or quality of being a hybrid.
meanings.sent1: The hybridity of the car made it unique.
meanings.sent2: The hybridity of the flower created a beautiful new species.
meanings.sent3: The hybridity of the cake surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her personality showed a hybridity of kindness and determination.
meanings.sent5: The hybridity of the painting captured the artist's creativity.

meanings.definition: The combination of two different elements or qualities.
meanings.sent1: The hybridity of flavors in the dish was delightful.
meanings.sent2: The hybridity of colors in the artwork was striking.
meanings.sent3: The hybridity of styles in her outfit was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The hybridity of scents in the room was overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The hybridity of textures in the fabric was intriguing.

meanings.definition: The process of crossbreeding different species or varieties.
meanings.sent1: The hybridity of plants resulted in stronger crops.
meanings.sent2: The hybridity of animals led to new breeds.
meanings.sent3: The hybridity of fruits in the experiment was fascinating.
meanings.sent4: The hybridity of genes in the study showed promising results.
meanings.sent5: The hybridity of cultures in the region enriched diversity.
